long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Confetti Pops is a Calming Extension that helps you feel good when you are feeling stressed out from your work. Just Open Confetti Pops and start popping , check your count on total pops and increase them.

Features:
- Pop From Different Directions
- Select Your Custom Audio File
- Customize the Theme and Button Colors
- Pop on Fullscreen with a Custom Message in custom Font Color, with a 3,2,1 Countdown.
- Customize the Number of Particles in Fullscreen Pop and their Spread , add a delay to start the pop.
- Pop and unlock badges, download the achievement badges or share them on social media.
